attributes.action: Bring the pensioners xmas bonus into line with present day cost of living
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: for many years now the xmas bonus has been out of touch with modern living,at one time it would have paid for two people to eat out at xmas, now it wonn´t even pay for the ingredients of a xmas dinner in the home.it is time for the government to stop giving money to non worth while projects,giving criminals a holiday camp to live in, bankers and civil workers outrages  bonuses that disgust the population,why should pensioners eat bread when the fat cats are eating cake? come on mr brown we have paid our taxes, show that you care
